content.title: Signal Processing
content.statement: Signal Processing is a fundamental concept in Engineering Electrical that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Signal Processing helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Signal Processing include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Signal Processing.

definitions_glossary.concept: A fundamental idea or notion in the domain
definitions_glossary.property: A characteristic or attribute of an entity
definitions_glossary.relationship: A connection or association between concepts
